definition[0]: an offensive word for someone who is very annoying or unpleasant
definition[1]: someone that you pretend to be annoyed with, although you actually like or love them
example[0]: The poor little bugger got an awful shock.
definition[2]: a job or activity that is very difficult
example[1]: The exam was a bit of a bugger.
definition[3]: said when you are annoyed or angry
example[2]: Bugger it! I donâ€™t see why I should pay for everything.
definition[4]: to have anal sex with someone
